Keywords: Pirate , Robot , Starjammers
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
BRAIN OF THE STARJAMMER ITSELF: Passenger: 4. When Waldo carries, it may carry friendly characters with the Starjammers keyword that are up to 4 squares away instead of adjacent.
SIKORSKY, THE SHIP MEDIC: When Waldo starts the game, generate a Sikorsky bystander that gains the Starjammers keyword.
EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS ACTIVATED!: Invulnerability. UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Starjammers keyword within 4 squares modify defense +1.
